library(quantmod)
MACD()
macd
signal
library(fTrading)
cdsTA()
cdoTA()
cdsTA
cdoTA
MACD()
percent=FALSE
MACD(close, 8, 17, 9, maType="EMA", percent=FALSE)
cdsTA(close, lag1 = 8, lag2 = 17, lag3 = 9)
cdoTA(close, lag1 = 8, lag2 = 17, lag3 = 9)
